title: Witnesses describe harrowing scenes at the hospital and school.
Trump, With Tariffs and Threats, Tries to Strong-Arm Nations to Retreat on Climate Goals
summary: The president has made no secret of his distaste for wind and solar in America. Now he’s taking his fossil fuel agenda overseas.

title: Trump Raises Tariffs on India to 50% Over Russian Oil
summary: As punishment for buying Russian oil, President Trump is doubling the tax on goods imported from India, jeopardizing a relationship decades in the making.

title: India Reels at Trump’s Highest Tariffs Yet
summary: Businesses and policymakers are casting around for help from unlikely places, as the country’s exports to the United States are crushed by 50 percent tariffs.

title: The A.I. Spending Frenzy Is Propping Up the Real Economy, Too
summary: The trillions of dollars that tech companies are pouring into new data centers are starting to show up in economic growth. For now, at least.

title: Prosecutors Fail to Secure Indictment Against Man Who Threw Sandwich at Federal Agent
summary: It was a sharp rebuke to the prosecutors who were assigned to bring charges against those arrested after President Trump’s deployment of National Guard troops and federal agents to Washington.

title: Longest-Running Rafiki Says Goodbye to ‘The Lion King’
summary: After more than 9,000 performances as the shaman in the Broadway show, Tshidi Manye prepares to hang up her baboon costume.

title: FDA Approves Updated Covid Vaccines With New Restrictions
summary: The agency’s fall recommendations underscore the goals of Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to limit access to the vaccines, which he has long opposed.

title: Riley Gaines Finished 5th. Now She Believes Victory Is in Her Grasp.
summary: The former college swimmer has used her race against Lia Thomas, a trans athlete, to propel her career as an influential, and unsparing, activist.

title: Federal Money Is a ‘Lifeline’ for This Republican School District
summary: President Trump wants to cut federal spending for education. The money often goes toward disadvantaged students in Republican states.

title: As PBS Stations Confront Cuts, American History Takes a Hit
summary: The documentary series “American Experience” begins an abbreviated schedule this week. A victim of the federal funding take-back, it has suspended production and laid off its staff.

title: Partial Heart Transplants Show Promise
summary: Owen Monroe was born with a deadly heart defect. Thanks to a cutting-edge surgery, now he’s starting preschool.

title: Denmark Summons U.S. Envoy Over Greenland Espionage Allegations
summary: It’s the latest twist in the Greenland drama. President Trump wants the island, but Denmark refuses to hand it over.

title: With Fuzzy Racket Bag, Venus Williams Highlights ERL and Other American Labels
summary: In her return at the U.S. Open, Ms. Williams decided to highlight labels based in the United States. Her shearling racket bag was hard to miss.

title: The Ralph Lauren Look of Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s Engagement Photos
summary: It’s picture-perfect, of course.

title: Taylor Swift’s Engagement Ring Marks a Return to Vintage Elegance
summary: The pop star’s antique-inspired sparkler channels the “heirloom look,” reflecting a return to antique stones.

title: The Rise of the Democratic National Security Mom
summary: The Democratic Party is counting on a new type of leader to counteract Trump.

title: All the Things Trump Thinks He Owns
summary: The White House is not the president’s property. Neither is the Smithsonian. Nor Washington itself.

title: The New State Interventions
summary: Protectionism, industrial policy and government ownership — all once conservative boogeymen — have become official doctrine.

title: After Blocking U.N. Nuclear Watchdog, Iran Allows Inspectors to Return
summary: Iran halted cooperation with the agency last month, as experts warned that Tehran may revive efforts to build a nuclear bomb.

title: Sean Duffy Says Penn Station Renovation Will Begin in 2027
summary: Amtrak intends to team up with a private developer to rebuild the dingy Manhattan train station on an accelerated schedule, transportation officials said.

title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Review: This A.I. Phone Can Save Time if You Surrender Your Data
summary: The new artificially intelligent Pixel can help people streamline certain tasks. But that efficiency may not be worth the data you give up, our reviewer writes.

title: Uncovering the Genes That Let Our Ancestors Walk Upright
summary: A new study reveals some of the crucial molecular steps on the path to bipedalism.
